name: LSDx Pool
description: What is the project about? LSDx is an ultra-liquid protocol for all LSD. We aim to optimize the financial value of liquid staking derivatives (LSD) assets, addressing their limited liquidity and lack of diverse financial scenarios that hinder their connection with various DeFi protocols. What makes your project unique? It is the only DEX that focuses on LSD token pairs. History of your project. Launched on March 16th. Whatâ€™s next for your project? We are also developing a stable coin called Ultrasound Money, which is similar to DAI but directly minted against LSD tokens. What can your token be used for? ETHX can be used for farming and gaining a share of the swap fee of the protocol
